How to use tqdm
  • Tools
Mar 5, 2020

Several methods to use tqdm in python.

1.

from tqdm import tqdm
for i in tqdm(range(10000)):
     sleep(0.01)

2.

for i in trange(100):
        sleep(0.1)

3.

pbar = tqdm(["a", "b", "c", "d"])
for char in pbar:
    pbar.set_description("Processing %s" % char)

4.

with tqdm(total=100) as pbar:
    for i in range(10):
        pbar.update(10)

5.

pbar = tqdm(total=100)
for i in range(10):
    pbar.update(10)
pbar.close()
